channel.title: Cointelegraph.com News
channel.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

image.title: Cointelegraph.com News
image.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

item.title: Nike NFTs to make their way into EA Sports games and its millions of fans
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Mitchelhill
item.description: Nike’s “virtual creations” will be integrated into EA Sports games in the coming months.

item.title: OpenAI CTO's Twitter hacked, shilling 'scam' crypto airdrop
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Jesse Coghlan
item.description: The crypto community on Twitter warned others not to click on a link posted on OpenAI CTO Mura Murati's Twitter account, which promised a free airdrop.

item.title: AI drone kept killing its human operator during simulation: Air Force colonel
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Jesse Coghlan
item.description: A United States Air Force colonel said the results of the simulation highlight why a conversation around ethics and artificial intelligence is needed.

item.title: Yuan stablecoin team arrested, WeChat’s new Bitcoin prices, HK crypto rules: Asia Express
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Zhiyuan Sun
item.description: Chinese RMB stablecoin issuer’s Shanghai office reportedly deserted after police raid, and WeChat offers Bitcoin prices — but for how long?

item.title: Standard Chartered, PwC make case for programmable CBDC in China Greater Bay Area
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: With 11 megalopolises and three currencies, Guangdong, Hong Kong and Macao make up a region that is ripe for central bank digital currency research.

item.title: Uniswap DAO rejects plan to charge LP fees; UNI holders cite tax concerns
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Blackstone
item.description: The proposal would have allowed Uniswap’s governing body to receive a percentage of the fees that currently go to liquidity providers.

item.title: Fed board issues order to Silvergate Bank as part of self-liquidation plan
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: Silvergate Capital Corporation and its crypto-friendly bank will have 10 days to submit a self-liquidation plan in compliance with California and federal requirements.

item.title: Money stored on mobile payment apps may not be FDIC insured, US watchdog warns
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: Deposits on mobile payment apps may not be insured by the FDIC, and customers may not know whether their money is insured or not.

item.title: Scientists propose quantum proof-of-work consensus for blockchain
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tristan Greene
item.description: Boson sampling was once considered a problem looking for a solution. Now, it might be the bridge that brings quantum computing to the blockchain.

item.title: Don't be surprised if AI tries to sabotage your crypto
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Gracy Chen
item.description: My own exchange, Bitget, tried using AI to respond to customer inquiries — and the results reminded us that AI tools come with perils.

item.title: Mysten Labs’ Sui network partners with F1 Red Bull racing team
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: The Red Bull team signed a $150 million sponsorship deal with crypto exchange Bybit in 2022 ahead of the market crash and major bankruptcies in the space.

item.title: Bitcoin price slips under $27K, but data shows BTC whales counter trading DXY strength
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By JJ
item.description: The U.S. Dollar Index is encroaching on new year-to-date highs, but Bitcoin whale activity suggests this may be a dead cat bounce.

item.title: What will Binance Australia services look like after debanking?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: Binance suspended fiat on- and off-ramps by bank transfers in Australia, as well as trading for Australian dollar (AUD) pairs.

item.title: Hong Kong-based First Digital Group launches redeemable USD-backed stablecoin
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: The Hong Kong trust company says the new FDUSD combines the stability of the U.S. dollar with the reliability of Asian regulation.

item.title: Dogecoin investors accuse Elon Musk of insider trading in amended class-action lawsuit
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: “This is a securities fraud class action arising from a deliberate course of carnival barking market manipulation and insider trading,” said the amended complaint.

item.title: Circle to launch ‘official version’ of USDC natively on Arbitrum
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tristan Greene
item.description: USDC stablecoin developer Circle will replace the current version of its token with one running natively on the Arbitrum network.

item.title: Why is Litecoin price up today?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Yashu Gola
item.category: Why is Litecoin price up today
item.description: Litecoin price is up today, as the growth in unique addresses throughout the month of May, continues into June.

item.title: 11 things the United States can learn from other nations’ crypto regulations
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Cointelegraph Innovation Circle
item.description: The United States doesn’t have to start from scratch when it comes to developing effective laws and guidelines for crypto.

item.title: ChatGPT can’t beat human smart contract auditors yet: OpenZeppelin’s Ethernaut challenges
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Luke Huigsloot
item.description: While ChatGPT-4 can’t compete with human auditors yet, OpenZeppelin noted it was not optimized to do so, and AI models trained for this purpose would likely be more accurate.

item.title: Georgian central bank to launch AML probe into crypto firms
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Helen Partz
item.description: The National Bank of Georgia will launch mandatory supervision of virtual asset service providers starting from Sept. 1, 2023.

item.title: Increasing number of divorce proceedings involve crypto
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Stephen Katte
item.description: Lawyers say they are seeing an increasing number of divorce settlements featuring digital assets.

item.title: BitCulture: Fine art on Solana, AI music, podcast + book reviews
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Savannah Fortis
item.description: Universal’s U-turn on AI music won’t please Ice Cube, former MOMA curator collects fine art on Solana, Edge of NFT podcast + Crypto Titans.

item.title: Italian senator provokes parliament with AI-generated speech
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Savannah Fortis
item.description: A senator in Italy utilized OpenAI’s GPT-4 to generate a speech during a parliamentary meeting to spark a “serious debate” about the technology.

item.title: Jimbos Protocol offers $800K bounty to the public after hacker ignores deal
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ezra Reguerra
item.description: The Jimbos Protocol team extended the bounty offer to the public, inviting anyone who can help catch the exploiter or recover the funds to claim the reward.

item.title: Does the US have a crypto ‘tax loophole’ problem?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Andrew Singer
item.description: The Biden administration wanted to nix a “special tax subsidy for cryptocurrency,” but it wasn’t in the May 28 debt ceiling bill. Another narrow escape?

item.title: Memecoins the next catalyst for crypto adoption — DappRadar analyst
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Elisha Owusu Akyaw
item.description: Sara Gherghelas, a blockchain research analyst at DappRadar, explains how the lower barrier of entry associated with memecoins may have sparked the adoption of the crypto asset class.

item.title: Tether (USDT) market cap breaks ATH, Binance CEO points at regulatory caps
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Prashant Jha
item.description: At a time when USDT is touching new market cap highs, other stablecoins are struggling to keep their market share.

item.title: Last BTC price dip before a $30K breakout? Bitcoin wipes weekend gains
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: A limp monthly close ends with Bitcoin closing its weekend futures gap, but BTC price action continues to disappoint.

item.title: Here’s how OpenAI plans to cleanse ChatGPT of false information
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Amaka Nwaokocha
item.description: OpenAI aims to reduce AI hallucinations in ChatGPT by enhancing math skills, as process supervision shows promise in improving accuracy.

item.title: ‘Not just Bitcoin price’ — Dan Tapiero shares tips on navigating the bear market
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ezra Reguerra
item.description: Veteran trader Dan Tapiero said the most important thing for traders is to make rational judgments that aren’t impacted by people’s fears.
